text:
(四) 分配結果通知書函。( 請自行至總處之公務人員考試錄取人員個人服務網下載)
(五) 曾任其他政府機關、公立學校或公營事業機構年資併計休假年資申請書 「1」份請列印簽名，如有相關年資，並請檢附相關證明 ；若無相關年資，請於序號1「服務機關(學校)或公營事業機構名稱」欄位處填寫「 無」(附件05)。
trans:
(4) Notification Letter of Allocation Results. (Please download it on your own from the Civil Service Examination Passers' Personal Service Website at the General Office)
(5) Application Form for Consolidating Service Years from Other Government Agencies, Public Schools, or State-Owned Enterprises for Vacation Entitlement, "1" copy, please print and sign. If there is relevant service years, please attach supporting documents; if there is no relevant service years, please write "None" in the "Service Agency (School) or State-Owned Enterprise Name" column under item 1 (Attachment 05).
